attributes.action: Compulsory Pay Rise In Private Sector to Catch Up With Inflation!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bosses in private sector getting away with not offering any pay rise despite rising cost of living although they are making money and putting prices up every year. I would request every one to sign the petetion.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
